## Download the data zipfile
```{r}
if (!require(downloader)) install.packages("downloader")
library(downloader)
download("http://www.postgresqltutorial.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/10/dvdrental.zip", destfile = "src/dvdrental.zip")
```
